## Targeting Methods

Breakdown of budget spent per targeting method.

```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load required libraries
library(dashboardr)
library(dplyr)
library(highcharter)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_small_14obs.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

```

## Budget per Targeting Method

```{r bar-target}
# Budget per Targeting Method
result <- create_bar(
  data = data,
  title = "Budget per Targeting Method",
  horizontal = TRUE,
  x_var = "target",
  weight_var = "perc",
  y_label = "% of total spend"
)

result
```
